title: Your Bluetooth headphones could be vulnerable to attack - here's what to do next
contentSnippet: Google Fast Pair offers the convenience of one-click accessory pairing, but its improper implementation has created a new security risk. See if your device is patched yet.
content: Google Fast Pair offers the convenience of one-click accessory pairing, but its improper implementation has created a new security risk. See if your device is patched yet.
